short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that analyzes all links on the active page, checks their rel attribute and content type (Text, Image, or Mixed).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly analyze all the links on any webpage to assess their content type and validate their accuracy. The Link Analyzer Tool is a Chrome extension designed to help users examine every link on a webpage, check its rel attribute, content type (Text, Image, or Mixed), and display the results in an easy-to-read format.

This tool allows users to quickly assess the validity and content of all links, making it ideal for webmasters, SEO professionals, and content creators looking to optimize and audit their web pages.

Features

1. Comprehensive Link Scanning: Analyzes all links on the currently active webpage, categorizing them based on content type (Text, Image, or Mixed) and rel attribute.
2. Real-Time Results: Instantly displays the status and content type of each link as the page loads.
User-Friendly Interface: Clear, intuitive layout that makes it easy to view link types and get insights into the content of each link.
3. Quick Content Validation: Helps you easily identify broken or irrelevant links, ensuring that your pageâ€™s content is up-to-date and relevant.

How to Use

To use the Link Analyzer Tool, simply follow these steps:
1. Navigate to the web page you want to analyze.
2. Click on the Link Analyzer Tool extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
3. Wait for the extension to scan all the links on the page.
4. View the results, which will display the URL, text content, content type (Text, Image, or Mixed) and rel attribute for each link.

Help & Support

For any issues, suggestions for improvements, or general inquiries, please reach out to our support team at support@genelify.com. We value your feedback and are here to assist you in enhancing your experience with our extension.
